name: Cutthroat
description: A Medium humanoid characterized by stealth and cunning nature, often seen with a shortsword and hand crossbow, ready for hit-and-run tactics.
memorable: Utilizes clever positioning and teamwork to maximize damage output through Sneak Attack.
goals: To ambush and eliminate foes using stealth and deception.
relations: May operate alongside other rogues or thieves; could be found in gangs or as part of a reconnaissance team.
environment: Urban areas or shadowy terrains where stealth and cunning are advantageous.
strengths: High Dexterity and skills in deception, stealth, and perception enhance its ambush capabilities.
weaknesses: Low hit points and armor class make it vulnerable if caught off guard.
attacks: Shortsword and Hand Crossbow strike with piercing damage, employing hit-and-run tactics.
most_powerful_ability: Sneak Attack to deal substantial damage when positioned advantageously.
senses: Passive Perception of 14, enabling effective threat detection.
skills: Profound in deception, insight, perception, and stealth, allowing for masterful manipulation and ambush strategies.
additional_information: Uses Cunning Action to reposition in combat.
Can make additional melee attacks with Rapid Attack.
Effective at coordinating attacks with allies.
Thrives in environments conducive to stealth.
Capable of dealing significant damage with well-timed attacks.
test_queries: agile rogue with a short sword
